message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something a bit more beneficial for me. Think carefully, the clock is ticking!
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. Think about the inflation!
Let's stop wasting time and split this evenly.  It's only going to get worse for both of us.
You're getting desperate, I can see. I'll give you a little more than last time, but not much.
This is a compromise, Alice. Take it before the inflation eats away at my share even further, and you end up with a worse deal.
I'm being generous, considering the inflation is only affecting you. Take it or leave it.
